biography: Riku is a golfer hailing from Kotojärven Kartanogolf. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Riku brings a calculated and steady presence to the course.

Riku's appearance in a past Hector Trophée event showcases his dedication to the sport and the tournament. While he may not have secured a victory at the Hector Trophée or claimed the Victor Trophy for individual performance, his participation underscores his commitment to competitive golf.

Brother of Panu, Riku's connection to the sport runs deep within his family. Though currently considered retired from Hector events, his impact on the tournament remains notable, and fans will remember his time competing in the event.
